  4. iOS 19 Leak Claims Bigger Update Than Expected, Ditches Pixel-Like Circular Icons But Adds VisionOS-Inspired Translucent Glass Effects Across The Entire Interface  Wccftech
  5. Apple’s WWDC 2025 event starts June 9th  The Verge

item.title: I genuinely don't understand why some people are still bullish about LLMs - Hacker News
